song.title: God of Calvary
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .C G/B Am F
[1] .C G/B Am On the hill of Calvary, the Light of all the world . F With the world on His shoulders .C The weight of all our shame . G/B Am On Him whom knew no sin . F A holy surrender .C/E F Am The sky went dark, the angels wept . G The Father looked away .C/E F Am The final breath, He bowed His head . G The Lamb of God was slain
[C] . C F By His wounds, I am set free . C/E F By His blood I've been redeemed . Am C/E F The great divide He crossed for me . C/G G C Oh, praise the God of Calvary --- [2] .C G/B Am On the hill of Calvary, into the Father's hands . F A holy surrender . C/E F Am A borrowed tomb, His mother wept . G And there His body lay .C/E F But the stone was moved . Am G He conquered death and rose from the grave
[B] . G Am F And if I never, never lose sight of this place . G Am C I will never, never lose sight of Your grace . G Am G The cross is all, all I need to see .F C/G G C Oh, praise the God of Calvary
